SoilHeader: A general soil map of Syria 1:1,000,000 has been prepared by ACSAD (1985) using the U.S.D.A. Soil Taxonomy (1975) as a classification system. The soils of Syria are represented by the following five orders :
teamheading: FSOLâ€™s team members are a group of researchers who are interested in documentation and study the plant biodiversity in Syria.   Each member of the team maintains the intellectual and literary rights to his contributions to FSOL.
publicationHead: This page includes samples of the team's scientific publications or articles and educational brochures that a team member contributed or published. The page also includes links to similar or related websites.
